pages.text: $Magan is not an Essence in the traditional meaning. It is much more a blend of primal essences and $Mana, a manifested version of arcane energy.

It is crafted by infusing $(l:manipulation/entry_reactor)$(item)Ash$() in an $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)Infusion Basin$() with the following aspects:$(li)Aether$(li)Air$(li)Earth$(li)Fire$(li)Water$(li)Mana
